content: the **bynx hat** is classically cabled knit this pattern works quickly in your favorite dk or worsted weight yarn **yarn​ ** 175 220 yards of any dk weight yarn - ​sample knit with knitting niqabi non-superwash merino dk in pumpkin spice ​ **needles ** ribbing​ - us 6 4 0 mm 16 circular needle bod ​- us 7 4 5 mm 16 circular needle **sizes ** ​child adult **gauge ** 21 sts & 25 row over 4 in stockinette blocked in the round on us 7 4 5 mm 24 sts & 28 row over 4 in main pattern blocked in the round on us 7 4 5 mm don t forget to check out the coordinating bynx cowl 1 pattern 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/bynx-cowl
